name: Color Ping Pong Dot
description:
Color Ping Pong is very addictive pong switch game. Color Ping Pong is crazy pong ball game in which you need to stay focused on the moving ball. In Color Ping Pong moving ball change its color to force you to make your move. You need to concentrate and tap in time to collide the pong ball with same color. You can switch the position of the balls by taping on the screen.
How to Play:
There are two colored balls at top and bottom (blue & pink) and there is on pong which is moving in between these balls. This jumping ball change its color so you need to concentrate on jumping ball and the ball in which jumping pong ball may collide. Moving pong ball should collide with same color ball either on top or bottom. If color is different then you need to tap on screen to adjust the ball according to the moving ball.

Just Concentrate and stay focused to enjoy this very addictive and puzzling game.
